messages.message: Clicking "Create conversation" on the home page while logged out on sandbox is actually trying to create a conversation and throwing a unauthorized error instead of going to the logless experience cc @Weiming Wu

This is so weird - it's happening on sandbox, and I double checked on my local , even for 24.26 code
Yet it doesn't happen on prod
Maybe the logless project isn't set up anymore on the environment so the `findConverseProject` logic fails and tries to create a new one?
That might be the case - I'm not seeing it on Crafting or UAT.

Yep, @Jessica you were spot on - the:
`/api/v2/aihub/converse/conversations?query_option=workspace&workspace=my-repo`call returns a blank array in the envs that try to create a new chat
The ones where a sample project is correctly opened returns an array with info about the sample project
Okay best case scenario! We just need to figure out where that project went
